prod_long_desc:
Make your castle fit for a princess with this LEGO® l Disney Castle Interior Kit, featuring small, buildable castle furniture and household items, assorted decorative accessory elements, a fabric rug and blanket, plus decorative stickers. Rebuild the furniture to make alternative items using the pictures for inspiration. Use this kit to customize your LEGO® l Disney building toys and inspire even more role-play fun.
Features small, buildable castle furniture and household items, assorted decorative accessory elements, a fabric rug and blanket, plus a sheet of decorative stickers.
Rebuild the furniture to create alternative items.
Transform the interiors of your existing LEGO® l Disney models.
Combine with the 40388 Mini-Doll Dress-Up Kit to create even more play possibilities for your LEGO® l Disney sets.
